content: ends do not tuck in your ends around the hair elastic because when it stretches those ends will come loose tuck in your ends inside of the stitches as best as you can block or iron your new hair piece to keep the petals from curling up on each other i preferred to iron them on medium heat high moisture and with a towel laying over them be careful not to melt the elastic or the yarn and try to iron just the petals really warning irons are hot those under 18 please have adult supervision flower scrunchie by brilliantbutton ©2025 kalene gardne 4 i hope you enjoyed the pattern if you did please consider leaving a review it would really help my shop find us on your socials for more fun @brilliantbuttoncrochet facebook instagram and tiktok tag me in your posts i d love to see what you made keep smiling kalene gardner brilliant button p s use code returnshopperx for 20% off your next purchase kalene gardner brilliantbutton 10685-b hazelhurst dr # 41470 houston tx 77043 usa huckleberrykg@gmail com for a more immediate reply please message me on etsy https //www etsy com/shop/brilliantbutton gpsr repeat ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie flower scrunchie by brilliantbutton ©2025 kalene gardne
